data.trans_hint: Chiếc xe buýt sẽ đến ngay bây giờ.
data.en_hint: A bus should come along any minute now.
data.content_game_1: A bus should come along any minute now.
data.answer_en_hint: A bus should come along any minute now.

data.trans: (+ sb) Xổ vào, xông vào (tấn công)
data.trans_hint: Con chó xông vào tấn công con tôi.
data.en_hint: The dog came at my son.
data.content_game_1: The dog came at my son.
data.answer_en_hint: The dog came at my son.

data.trans: (+ st) Rời đi với ấn tượng hoặc cảm xúc nào đó
data.trans_hint: Nhiều người ra đi với ý nghĩ rằng người Trung Quốc không đáng tin cậy.
data.en_hint: Many people come away with the idea that Chinese people just cannot be trusted.
data.content_game_1: Many people come away with the idea that Chinese people just cannot be trusted.
data.answer_en_hint: Many people come away with the idea that Chinese people just cannot be trusted.

data.trans_hint: Bạn có chắc mình có thể ghé qua lúc chín giờ không?
data.en_hint: Are you sure you can come by at nine?
data.content_game_1: Are you sure you can come by at nine?
data.answer_en_hint: Are you sure you can come by at nine?

data.trans_hint: Tài năng đến từ sự siêng năng, và kiến thức có được là do tích lũy.
data.en_hint: Talents come from diligence, and knowledge is gained by accumulation.
data.content_game_1: Talents come from diligence, and knowledge is gained by accumulation.
data.answer_en_hint: Talents come from diligence, and knowledge is gained by accumulation.

data.trans: Nhận được những thứ không thoải mái
data.trans_hint: Các chính sách kinh tế của chính phủ đã bị chỉ trích rất nhiều.
data.en_hint: The government's economic policies have come in for a lot of criticism.
data.content_game_1: The government's economic policies have come in for a lot of criticism.
data.answer_en_hint: The government's economic policies have come in for a lot of criticism.

data.trans: Trở nên quan trọng trong một tình huống cụ thể
data.trans_hint: Tiền không thực sự quan trọng lúc này.
data.en_hint: Money doesn't really come into it.
data.content_game_1: Money doesn't really come into it.
data.answer_en_hint: Money doesn't really come into it.

data.trans_hint: Nào, Junior, đến giờ đi ngủ rồi.
data.en_hint: Come on, Junior, time for bed.
data.content_game_1: Come on, Junior, time for bed.
data.answer_en_hint: Come on, Junior, time for bed.

data.trans_hint: Không một thứ gì có thể xen vào giữa bọn họ vì tình yêu của họ đủ lớn để vượt qua mọi khó khăn.
data.en_hint: Nothing can come between him and her as their love is big enough to weather any storms.
data.content_game_1: Nothing can come between him and her as their love is big enough to weather any storms.
data.answer_en_hint: Nothing can come between him and her as their love is big enough to weather any storms.
